content: Hey all, just a heads up that it's starting to get a bit busy for me with getting everything set up to transition into the new job. I've been skimming over your recent discussion, but since I'm also taking a (more or less) week off between one and the other the time has probably come to focus on moving over, so I'll be around somewhat less for the rest of the month.

I'll try to not drift completely out of sync in the meantime, and I sincerely hope to be able to actively return in December. I might need to figure this out timing-wise, but I'll do my best :relaxed:
Don't go too crazy renaming all the things while I'm not looking :P
